page.title: 05Family Life by Sally
page.content:
Every day my Mum goes off to work she usually goes early in the morning. I hardly ever see my Dad because he goes abroad to lots of different countries. We live in a big house and my Nan and Grampa live in a bungalow joined to our house. Just recently I have been sleeping in the bungalow because my Dad's in the USA and my Mum has been working late nights at the restaurant in Swindon.
At home I play with our cats or watch television. Sometimes I go skating. I am going to boarding school in September.
